wiI7pd: A decent place to get some boba milk tea. We had the Earl Grey Milk Tea with 3Js.  There wasn't anything really special or a drink that stood out to me.  The service was friendly and quick as we were the only ones there.

My favorite Gong Cha! The staff are awesome. My drink was made to perfection. It looks like a lot of people love the location. There was also cool illustrations in the store. It was definitely an exciting place to visit and enjoy tea.

We had the pleasure of visiting Harvard Square and happened upon this lovely tea shop. Our teas were refreshing and just what we needed after a long day of site seeing. Service was friendly and tea was made promptly. Highly recommend!!

Gong Cha is my favorite brand for authentic milk tea. This shop was clean, nice, and quick to complete my order. We ordered 7 drinks and all were made well. I also love those egg waffles, HK classic. Strongly recommend the Matcha Strawberry latte with some original egg waffles.

There are better Boba spots in the greater Boston area, but if you're near Harvard, this is a good spot to hit. Nice, but smaller, seating area to relax at or take your drink on a lively stroll through the area.

Greatest boba shop in the world. Service is kind and instant. Teas have the perfect flavor and sweetness (and even then they‚Äôre customizable and consistent so you can find what you like). ‚Ä¶
Great spot for Milk Tea. My favorite is earl grey with the 3 J's. The owner Barry is super cool guy to talk to and welcoming.
Lovely service. Amazing selection and store is  very clean. Tried the Dirty Brown Sugar Milk Tea and it tastes almost heaven-like.

We ordered two bubble teas in the evening of Aug. 8 2023, a medium Taro and a large Pearl Milk Tea. The pearls in the Pearl Milk Tea had a texture of soggy bread and were not chewy at all. They were obviously too old, cooked too long time ‚Ä¶

Excellent bubble tea with countless variations of flavors and add-ins. Nice place with seating area by the window and several high-tops. Staff who worked here were courteous and accommodating. Will be back!

Brand new location in the heart of Harvard Sq. About 5 min walk from the t station. Owners are extremely friendly. As usual they have the highest quality tea, so you will get your standard Gong Cha drinks. I got the milk foam green tea and pearl milk tea.

I went to Gong Cha earlier this evening with my boyfriend. When I walked inside it was immaculate, clean floors and friendly presence. Barry one of the owners talked with us and made us feel very welcome. This is the real deal tea. I would ‚Ä¶
Best bubble tea shop in Boston!!! Amazing service and the bobba was made to perfection. The staff is warm & friendly with awesome customer service!!! This is my new favorite bubble tea shop :)
This place is very costly, almost double the price. I got a taro milk tea for around $7.15 approx. Not worth i would say. The 2 stars is for the not a bad taste. still not worth it
The best bubble tea shop around Harvard area ! The ingredients are super fresh and and flavors are just perfect, and staffs are very nice and friendly , the best Gongcha of all locations!

I had the strawberry milk tea and the boba and it was great. The boba was chewy and the tea was just the right amount. The staff was kind so In short the tea was refreshing and would come back any time üßã ‚Ä¶
Every time I come here the people taking the order  manage get it wrong despite me repeating my order several times to them (wrong size twice, missing an item once).
Great location, very fast service, Yummy drinks and waffle.
I do not usually write reviews, but this Gong cha's service was just so friendly! I would definitely come back to this new location with my friends when I am back in Boston.
Great tea place! The ambiance is very clean and trendy, the staff are friendly, and most importantly the tea is delicious! 10/10 would recommend!
Delicious, not over sugared, balanced drinks. Boba is cooked to the right level
Hands down best tea around! It‚Äôs very clean and the staff is extremely friendly and knowledge . If your in the area highly recommend going there , you definitely won‚Äôt be disappointed!
Delicious drinks, friendly workers, and overall good vibes. The winter melon milk tea is a must!
Went to visit Gong Cha yesterday.  It was an amazing experience.  Great bubble tea and great team working there !!!  I wish them tons of luck
Great service, great staff, a lot of patience and recommendations, always making a conversation while waiting for the drinks. Boba tastes fresh and chewy.
Must try Oolong bubble(chewy!) milk tea!
Bubble tea in Harvard Square, so good!
This location overcharges and charges for toppings that are supposed to be included with the drink but Gong Cha in general is still the best
Amazing drinks, really sweet staff, very clean atmosphere, and everything is brand new! Lovely place and would highly recommend!

My favorite gongcha in the Boston area!! Staff are super friendly and the drinks are consistently amazing
Service was delightful. Staff were friendly and offered suggestions and tips on what to order. Will be coming back more often.
